book.O Senhor dos Anéis: A Sociedade do Anel: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
book.O Homem do Castelo Alto: The Man in the High Castle
book.Harry Potter e a Pedra Filosofal: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
book.Star Wars: O Império Contra-Ataca: Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back
book.O Guia do Mochileiro das Galáxias: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

sinopse.Duna: Paul Atreides, a young prince, finds himself in the middle of an intergalactic battle for control of a valuable desert planet.
sinopse.O Hobbit: Bilbo Baggins, a hobbit, is drawn into an adventure full of dangers to recover a lost treasure.
sinopse.A Guerra dos Tronos: In the world of Westeros, families vie for the Iron Throne, with power struggles, betrayal and magic.
sinopse.Neuromancer: Case, a hacker, is hired for a dangerous job that will take him to the center of an artificial intelligence network.
sinopse.Eragon: O Ciclo da Herança: Eragon, a young farmer, finds a dragon egg and is forced to embark on a journey to save his world.
sinopse.O Nome do Vento: Kvothe, a legendary hero, tells his own story, from his childhood to the heroic deeds that made him famous.
sinopse.Blade Runner: Rick Deckard, a replicant hunter, must hunt down and 'retire' illegal androids in a dystopian future.
sinopse.1984: In a totalitarian future, Winston Smith fights against an oppressive regime that controls every aspect of people's lives.
sinopse.O Conto da Aia: In a dystopian future, women are controlled by a totalitarian regime and forced to fulfill specific roles in society.
sinopse.O Senhor dos Anéis: A Sociedade do Anel: Frodo Baggins, a hobbit, is tasked with destroying the One Ring and saving Middle-earth.
sinopse.A Máquina do Tempo: A scientist travels through time and witnesses the drastic changes in human society, from the distant future to the decay of the planet.
sinopse.Fahrenheit 451: In a future where books are banned, Guy Montag is a firefighter tasked with burning books, but begins to question his role in society.
sinopse.O Homem do Castelo Alto: In an alternate reality, where the Nazis won World War II, a man investigates a mysterious book.
sinopse.Harry Potter e a Pedra Filosofal: Harry Potter discovers he is a wizard and begins his journey at Hogwarts School of Magic.
sinopse.Percy Jackson e o Ladrão de Raios: Percy Jackson, a boy with discipline problems, discovers he is a demigod and sets out on a mission.
sinopse.Star Wars: O Império Contra-Ataca: The heroes of the Rebel Alliance face the galactic empire, as Luke Skywalker seeks to understand his destiny.
sinopse.O Guia do Mochileiro das Galáxias: Arthur Dent, an ordinary human, is taken on an intergalactic journey after Earth is destroyed to build a space highway.
sinopse.A Mão Esquerda da Escuridão: On a distant planet, Genly Ai, an emissary, tries to convince a cold, gender-neutral planet to join the interplanetary union.
